data.eml:eml: Six years of fruit fly surveys in Bangladesh: a new species, 33 new country records and discovery of the highly invasive Bactrocera carambolae (Diptera, Tephritidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Leblanc, Luc, Hossain, M. Aftab, Doorenweerd, Camiel, Ahmed Khan, Shakil, Momen, Mahfuza, San Jose, Michael, Rubinoff, Daniel (2019): Six years of fruit fly surveys in Bangladesh: a new species, 33 new country records and discovery of the highly invasive Bactrocera carambolae (Diptera, Tephritidae). ZooKeys 876: 87-109, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.876.38096, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.876.38096
